alert.note: Alert for Southern San Luis Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 12:20PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Huerfano, southeastern Costilla and southwestern Las Animas Counties through 1245 PM MDT... At 1219 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sanchez Reservoir, or 24 miles north of Questa, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... San Pablo around 1225 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong winds may occur without any rain or thunder.
